name: Vault
description: Enterprise-grade memory system. Maintains agent context, lead history, decision logs, and system state. Rehydrates agents with domain knowledge before each run. Backs all data to GitHub as the immutable audit trail. Supports semantic search via Vertex AI embeddings.

llm.role: Semantic search index, context relevance scoring

skills: Context rehydration (last N entries for LLM context window)
Keyword and semantic search across stored entries
Cross-agent knowledge sharing via global namespace
trigger: Called by all agents before and after each run
